casebody.data:
PARAMOUNT RX, INC.
v.
Robert E. DUGGAN and Agelity, Inc. No. 376A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 1, 2016. Christopher Jones, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Paramount Rx, Inc. Leslie C. Packer, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Duggan, Robert E., et al. James Michael Weiss, Attorney at Law, for Duggan, Robert E., et al. Amanda G. Ray, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Paramount Rx, Inc.

*746The following order has been entered on the joint motion filed on the 31st of March 2016 by Plaintiff to Lift Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of April 2016."
